    public final class ConnectionPoller
extends org.agrona.nio.TransportPoller
implements org.agrona.concurrent.Agent
    Agent used to perform select operations on a ServerSocket.

      • ConnectionPoller

        public ConnectionPoller​(java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel serverSocket,

                        org.agrona.concurrent.IdleStrategy idleStrategy,
                        SocketConfig socketConfig,
                        ConnectionRouter connectionRouter)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        serverSocket - the server socket to select on
        toServerChannels - thread-safe queues that will be polled by session container instances
        idleStrategy - idle strategy to use when queue is full
        socketConfig - configuration to apply to opened sockets
        connectionRouter - indicates what server instance the new connection should be dispatched to
